byline.original: By EMILY STEEL and RAVI SOMAIYA

abstract: Fox News host Bill O'Reilly bolsters his defense on his show against reports that he exaggerated stories about his war reporting of Falkland Islands and covering unrest in Buenos Aires; somer former CBS News colleagues say he has embellished claims.
lead_paragraph: On Monday’s show, Mr. O’Reilly played CBS News footage from 1982 that showed violent protests and quoted correspondents describing the scene, but former colleagues said his account was still flawed. (With video.)

headline.main: Bill O’Reilly and Fox News Redouble Defense of His Falklands Reporting
headline.print_headline: Fox News Host Intensifies Defense of War Reporting

snippet: On Monday’s show, Mr. O’Reilly played CBS News footage from 1982 that showed violent protests and quoted correspondents describing the scene, but former colleagues said his account was still flawed. (With video.)
